description: river scene with two weeping willow trees; figures with fishing pole and basket in LLC, with nude bather with a fish; three figures fishing at left in middle ground; people with nets at right in middle ground; winding river
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Snow, Moon, and Flowers at Famous Places (Meisho setsugekka 名所雪月花)
title: Catching Sweetfish in the Tama River under the Autumn Moon
